homepage.first-block-desc: Your perfect tool for swapping tokens between networks
homepage.second-block-desc: Swapica is a decentralised platform for exchanging tokens between networks. It is designed to solve a single problem: crosschain atomic swaps.
homepage.second-block-second-desc: Swapica is built around a concept of order books. Users may create, match, and claim peer orders via the set of smart contracts and validators that operate the dapp.
homepage.third-block-desc-1: Create your own crosschain orders by selecting the tokens you would like to sell and buy at the desired rate.
homepage.third-block-desc-2: Find an appropriate crosschain order and match it to initiate the exchange of assets.
homepage.third-block-desc-3: Claim the tokens of matched orders on the dedicated page or use a relayer to claim them on your behalf.
homepage.fourth-block-desc: Swapica Faucet is a service to give developers leeway on test networks. Head here to receive some test tokens. Not enough? Create the crosschain testnet order to buy what you need!
homepage.faq-title-1: Why use Swapica if there is Sushiswap?
homepage.faq-desc-1: Swapica tends to solve a different problem. It acts as a custom bridge between networks for exchanging assets between them. Swapica doesn't rely on liquidity pools or a specific set of tokens to operate, however, orders may take a long time matching.
homepage.faq-desc-2: Swapica may be used to atomically execute cross chain orders at a fixed price or to obtain some test tokens if you will.
homepage.faq-title-3: Order books are poor on-chain, what was the decision behind them?
homepage.faq-desc-3: Order books are simple to understand and implement. We wanted to cover as many chains as we could (including testnets) to bring atomicity wide.
homepage.faq-title-4: The dapp flow is too complicated, how can I make it simpler?
homepage.faq-desc-4: You can use relayers to delegate some parts of the flow to them. Relayers are here to ease your application experience.

terms.title: Swapica Terms of Use
terms.desc: By continuing to use Swapica, you accept the updated Terms of Use below. Premium Subscribers who do not wish to accept the updated Terms must close their Swapica account prior to their next billing cycle or April 23, 2023, whichever comes first.
terms.block-5-title: 5. Customer Support, Information, Questions, and Complaints
terms.block-1-desc-part-1: Please read these Terms of Use ("Terms") carefully as they govern your use of (which includes access to) Swapica’s personalized services for streaming music and other content, including all of our websites and software applications that incorporate or link to these Terms (collectively, the "Swapica Service") and any music, videos, podcasts, audiobooks, or other material that is made available through the Swapica Service ("Content").
terms.block-1-desc-part-2: Use of the Swapica Service is subject to the Swapica Privacy Policy and additional terms and conditions presented by Swapica, all of which are made part of these Terms by this reference.
terms.block-1-desc-part-3: By signing up for, or otherwise using, the Swapica Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, then you must not use the Swapica Service or access any Content.
terms.block-1-desc-part-4: THESE TERMS CONTAIN A MANDATORY ARBITRATION PROVISION THAT, AS FURTHER SET FORTH IN SECTION 6 BELOW, REQUIRES THE USE OF ARBITRATION ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS TO RESOLVE DISPUTES, RATHER THAN JURY TRIALS OR ANY OTHER COURT PROCEEDINGS, OR CLASS ACTIONS OF ANY KIND. IN ARBITRATION THERE IS LESS DISCOVERY AND APPELLATE REVIEW THAN IN COURT.
terms.block-1-subblock-1-desc: These Terms are between you and Swapica USA Inc., 4 World Trade Center, 150 Greenwich Street, 62nd Floor, New York, NY, 10007.
terms.block-1-subblock-2-desc: BY USING THE SWAPICA SERVICE, YOU AFFIRM THAT YOU ARE 18 YEARS OR OLDER TO ENTER INTO THESE TERMS, OR, IF YOU ARE NOT, THAT YOU ARE 13 YEARS OR OLDER AND HAVE OBTAINED PARENTAL OR GUARDIAN CONSENT TO ENTER INTO THESE TERMS. Additionally, in order to use the Swapica Service and access any Content, you represent that: you reside in the United States, and any registration and account information that you submit to Swapica is true, accurate, and complete, and you agree to keep it that way at all times.
terms.block-2-subblock-1-desc: We provide numerous Swapica Service options. Certain Swapica Service options are provided free of charge, while other options require payment before they can be accessed ("Paid Subscriptions"). We may also offer special promotional plans, memberships, or services, including offerings of third-party products and services. We are not responsible for the products and services provided by such third parties.
terms.block-2-subblock-2-desc: From time to time, we or others on our behalf may offer trials of Paid Subscriptions for a specified period without payment or at a reduced rate ("Trial"). By using a Swapica Service via a Trial, you agree to the Swapica Premium Promotional Offer Terms.
